channel.title: Request - Tombstone
channel.description:
Well, since I cba to get better at Photoshop or GIMP, I was wondering if someone could throw me together a specific image. It needs to be fairly large, 640 x 480 at least, and I want it to be a grey-ish weathered looking tombstone that is cracked in several places with a butterfly embedded into it. I'd prefer if the butterfly looked something like this:
[img]http://www.yesnet.yk.ca/schools/jackhulland/projects/butterflies/lifecycle/colouring/butterfly.gif[/img]
If someone could throw me something like that together, it would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Request - Tombstone
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

=) Thanks exe, don’t feel rushed, I need this to look good xD.

Read full topic

Holy shit, now I need to learn how to use C4D.

item.title: Request - Tombstone
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

Pretty good sketch exe, only I don’t see where you’ll put the atmosphere in, but knowing you, everything will look perfect. Oh, and that butterfly was EXACTLY what I was hoping for.

item.title: Request - Tombstone
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

I have the image in my mind, I just didn’t make it thick-enough at the angle it is, and I was so tired when I made it. I plan on making several changes in the next copy, I have an idea of the atmosphere, now I need to recreate it.

Read full topic

item.title: Request - Tombstone
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

I think that would be a little hard to do, like get all the proportions right from that angle. It was obviously hard to do in that sketch. Maybe if it was done from the front it would be easier. Or like in a landscape view, with the tombstone to the side, still being the focal point and with the moons lighting really setting off the atmosphere. I wish I could print screen my mind!

Read full topic

item.title: Request - Tombstone
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Forgot to upload it before I went to bed yesterday, but I made a rough sketch of what I think your asking for, tell me if its right?

Read full topic

item.title: Request - Tombstone
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

Viewing it from the left side, I’d also like it to be at night time, with a quarter moon and stars out if its not much of a problem.

Theres another image of a butterfly, but if it was a little simpler than that, it would be great.

Read full topic
